mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar_details(uuid, object_id, calendar_id, calendar_details, account_id, object_type, event_id, event_type) VALUES(#{event.uuid}, #{event.objectId}, #{event.calendarId}, #{event.calendarDetails}, #{event.accountId}, #{event.objectType}, #{event.eventId}, #{event.eventType});
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar_details SET updated_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, calendar_details=#{calendarData} where object_id=#{id}
UPDATE calendar_details SET updated_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, is_deleted=1 where event_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT event_type, object_id FROM calendar_details where event_id=#{id} and is_deleted=0;
SELECT nylas_token FROM user_account where username=#{email} and is_deleted=0;
